about_the_game:
Step into a shadowy and dangerous world where you are the monster.

You’ve just experienced the passage from mortal life to vampiric undeath, left abandoned by the one responsible. Survive the treachery of your vampiric peers and choose how to align yourself as you discover the intricate web of power struggles and deadly rivalries that govern undead society.

Keep your true nature hidden from the unsuspecting mortals around you, as you tread the thin line between predator and person. The statue of the Unnamed Martyr cries red with blood while chaos erupts across the Isle of Gallow. Once the dust is settled you are tasked with investigating the mysterious portents in red.

‘Harrowed World: Portents In Red’ seamlessly combines thrilling modern combat with immersive roleplaying mechanics, putting an emphasis on story and atmosphere. Unleash Your Inner Vampire in this ultimate modern gothic RPG experience.

Danger is everywhere, and trust is a rare commodity. Choose your allies and enemies well.

Good luck, vampire.

• Unleash your inner vampire with the detailed character creation system.

• Explore the darkly vibrant open world island map.

• Satisfy your need for blood by feeding on the human inhabitants.

• Employ supernatural powers to manipulate, control or harm those around you.

• Experience the immersive story and atmosphere with a mix of dark gothic and modern styling.

• Discover the various vampiric factions and choose your allegiance.

• Complete varied tasks designed to cater for different gameplay styles and encourage replayability.

• Gain XP from finishing tasks, rather than kill count.

• Pick dialogue choices with the potential to change the outcome of a task or alter your reputation with a particular faction.

A dark and twisted version of our world where supernatural creatures hide among humanity. Vampires, magical folk, and other beings compete for power and influence through secret societies, corporate power, and religious sects.

Harrowed World takes creatures of myth and folklore reimagining them as concealed predators and tricksters. This vision of the world is dystopian and bleak with both human and inhuman horrors, but most people are blissfully ignorant of the dark forces at work around them.

Harrowed World is the shared setting and franchise of a growing number of video games and (soon) books, combing elements of gothic horror, adventure, dystopian fiction, drama, science fiction, Lovecraftian horror, and urban fantasy. Experience Harrowed World from a variety of perspectives from the prowling vampire to the monster hunting Beholder.

content_descriptors.notes: This title may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work, like frequent violence or gore. Some players may find elements of the game’s story and characters uncomfortable. This title is not suitable for those who are easily offended by such content.
